descriptionContainer.message.about: During these years, I have worked as a full stack and frontend developer, leading developments from planning to production deployment.

workExperienceContainer.message.andyPart: Lead developer and person in charge of the support of two McDonald's projects (example: https://pidetufactura.mcdonalds.es).

Lead Andy's Frontend and Backend developments in the app (https://my.andyapp.io) and in the back-office (https://panel.andyapp.io): (analyze the problem, document the tasks, develop in a scalable way, testing and document new functionalities and deploy to production).
Design and implement Andy's infrastructure (microservices and CI/CD).
Agile Methodologies (Sprints of 1 week with Scrum and Kanban).
Assist support team with technical tickets.
Assisting in the selection process (technical part).
workExperienceContainer.message.dogyDiet: Development and maintenance and testing of the frontend of the main website (https://dogfydiet.com), the client area (https://app.dogfydiet.com) and the internal apps.
Code review (pull request from frontend and backend).
workExperienceContainer.message.kriterPa: Developed and maintained two e-commerce sites, providing customer support (example: https://gallissa.com).
Developed and maintained internal scripts to automatize tasks and analyze data.
